resources.string: Alert the user that the service is still running in the background.
This app requires Spotify to be installed in order to function.
Could not establish connection with Spotify.

Uh oh. Looks like you\'re not a Spotify Premium user. This app requires Premium features in order to function.\n\nSpotify Premium lets you play any track, ad-free and with better audio quality. Go to spotify.com/premium to try it for free.
This app requires location permissions to calculate your speed, in order to select which tracks to play.
In order to function when the device is in standby mode, this app requires battery optimization whitelist permissions.
